TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSchemaFractionDigitsFacet extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaNumericFacet

Docs.summary: Specifies a restriction on the number of digits that can be entered for the fraction value of a simpleType element. The value of fractionDigits must be a positive integer. Represents the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) facet.
